name: Sleep Walker
description:
(press any key on the title screen to start the game)

Sleep Walker was made for Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2018! The theme was [genre] without [mechanic]. So we made a platforming game in which the character doing all the platforming isn't controlled by the player. Instead, you control a separate character, shooting things that help get the platforming character to the end of the level. In this sense it's also technically a top-down shooter without vertical scrolling, but it's mainly about the platforming!

Credits:

  • Art & Concept: Kyle Labriola
  • Code & Design: Alex Rosetti
  • Music: Alex Rosetti & Marina Khatin

Tools Used:

  • Construct 3 (game engine)
  • Adobe Flash (graphics)
  • Clip Studio Paint (title graphic)
  • REAPER (music)
